attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britannia is the most British of figures and has been for around two millennia. She has featured on our coinage for over 300 years continuously (currently on the 50p coin) and is about to lost with the next issue. Traditions bind the British together and should not be so casually cast aside.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
